name: DS_Sword Action
description:
Saw a few videos of Dark souls inspired game projects on youtube, figured I'll try to make one in unity.

Instructions:

Keyboard Controls

  • Movements:      W/A/S/D
  • Dodge: Space bar 
  • Attack: First Mouse Button 
  • Block:  Second Mouse Button 
  • Special Attack: Z
  • Equip/ Unequip: E
  • Strafe/Lock On: Tab-Key
  • Camera Rotation: Mouse
  • Pause: Escape key

Game Pad Controller:

  • Movements:    Left Analog
  • Dodge:   A
  • Attack: X
  • Block:  B
  • Special Attack:      Y
  • Equip/ Unequip:   LB
  • Strafe/Lock On:   RB
  • Camera Rotation:    Right Analog
  • Pause:  Start Button

Hints:

Player can recover health after not taking damage over time, so can enemy

Watch your stamina, [green bar]
